wikipedia_page.main: Andy Remic is a British author of thrillers, science fiction and military science fiction. He is also an indie filmmaker.

response: The new team continues to publish books in the Solaris tradition, maintaining existing relationships with authors such as Brian Lumley, Andy Remic and Juliet McKenna and also discovering new voices in the SF and fantasy genres. As of August 2010, Solaris had published seventy-three titles by twenty-nine authors,Authors, Solaris Books, 1 August 2010 including anthologies and new editions of out-of-print titles.
